#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked
#define md 1000000007
using namespace std;
inline void inp(int &n) {
    register int c = gc(); n=0; while(c < '0' || c > '9')c = gc();
    while(c >= '0' && c <= '9') {n = (n << 3) + (n << 1) + c - '0'; c = gc();}
}
inline void sscan(string &s){
    register char c=gc(); s=""; while(c==' ' || c=='\n' || c==EOF) c=gc();
    while(c!=' ' && c!='\n' && c!=EOF){s+=c;c=gc();}
}
inline void sprint(string s){
    register int i=0; while(s[i]){pc(s[i++]);} pc('\n');
}
int main() { 
    int i,j,k,n,c;
    inp(c);
    while(c--){
        inp(n);
        string s, t;
        int aa, ab, bb, ba, caa,cab,cbb,cba;
        std::map<string, int> mp;
        for(i=0;i<n;++i){
            sscan(t);
            mp[t]+=1;
        }
        aa = mp["aa"];
        caa = aa/2;
        aa = aa%2;

        bb = mp["bb"];
        cbb = bb/2;
        bb = bb%2;
 
        ab = mp["ab"];
        ba = mp["ba"];
 
        for(i = 0;i<caa;i++) s+="aa";
        for(i = 0;i<min(ab,ba);i++) s+="ab";
        for(i = 0;i<cbb;i++) s+="bb";
        
        if(aa) s+="aa";
        else if(bb)s+="bb";
        
        for(i = 0;i<cbb;++i) s+="bb";
        for(i = 0;i<min(ab,ba);++i) s+="ba";
        for(i = 0;i<caa;++i) s+="aa";
 
        sprint(s);
    }
    return 0;
}
